original_text:
Every valley shall be filled,
    and every mountain and hill shall be made low,
and the crooked shall become straight,
    and the rough places shall become level ways,
korean_text: 모든 골짜기가 메워지고 모든 산과 작은 산이 낮아지고 굽은 것이 곧아지고 험한 길이 평탄하여질 것이요

sentences.original_text: and every mountain and hill shall be made low,
and the crooked shall become straight,
and the rough places shall become level ways,
sentences.korean_translation: 험한 길이 평탄한 길이 될 것이요,
